Chunk

Generic type for a Chunk throughout the PIPE network. Contains various utilities to work with chunks too.

Functions
from_bytes

Converts raw bytes (u8 array) and a tag to a Chunk. Returns an error if the bytes are above N_CHUNK_BYTES (currently 5MB limit (5242880 bytes)).  Tags have a limit of 32 bytes.

Example
let chunk_1_tag = &[10, 39, 210, 19, 304, 29, 210];
let bytes = "Hello".as_bytes().to_vec();
let retrieved_chunk = Chunk::from_bytes(bytes, &chunk_1_tag).await.unwrap();
get_address

Gets Address object of the current Chunk

See Also

Address

tag_to_address

Gets Address object of the any given tag

See Also

Address
